html: Second, I will continue to put out music because it is a part of me and I also want to continue to connect with my fans in that way. It will likely be at a slower pace but know that I am working on it! I will keep you up to date on releases and such.

html: First, the reason why I'm taking this time out to study is very connected to how i feel about social media. As an entertainer, for years I struggled with social media because I felt like there was a more loving and human way to connect with fans. That is what I'm going to study
text: First, the reason why I'm taking this time out to study is very connected to how i feel about social media. As an entertainer, for years I struggled with social media because I felt like there was a more loving and human way to connect with fans. That is what I'm going to study
